title: Playful single-page Propose Day Surprise (dodging No + reveal-on-Yes image)

requirements.summary: Create a single-page React UI with centered heading, a constrained two-button row, and an initially-empty output area.
acceptanceCriteria: On initial page load, the heading, two buttons, and an empty output area are visible and centered vertically and horizontally.
The button row is contained within a centered region approximately equivalent to max-width ~400px and supports button repositioning within that region.

file_operations.description: Create the single-page React view rendering the heading ‚ÄúWill you always be mine?‚Äù, a centered button container (max width ~400px, positioned to allow the No button to move within it), and an output area below that starts empty.
Add global layout styles to ensure the app root can center content both vertically and horizontally (e.g., full-height html/body/#root) while keeping the output area below the button row.

requirements.summary: Implement playful styling (Comic Sans-like typography, warm diagonal gradient, shadows, pill buttons, and glowing rounded output image).
acceptanceCriteria: The page uses a warm diagonal gradient background (similar to #fceabb ‚Üí #f8b500).
Heading appears large and prominent with a subtle shadow.
Yes button is pink/red with a shadow; No button is green with its own shadow; both have hover effects (color change + slight scale).
When the image is shown, it appears responsive (max width ~90% of viewport), rounded, and with a warm glow shadow.

file_operations.description: Implement the warm diagonal gradient background, Comic Sans-like font stack, large heading styling with subtle shadow, pill button styling with distinct red/green colors + shadows and hover transitions, and image styling for rounded corners with warm glow shadow.
Extend Tailwind theme tokens as needed to support the warm palette (yellows/oranges/pinks/greens) and consistent shadows/rounded styles without introducing a blue/purple primary theme.

requirements.summary: Make the ‚ÄúNo, never!‚Äù button dodge the cursor within its container and show an exact alert on click.
acceptanceCriteria: Hovering (mouseenter) over the No button causes it to jump to a new random position within the bounds of the button container (not the entire page).
Clicking the No button triggers a browser alert with the exact message text provided.

file_operations.description: Add No button interactions: on mouseenter, compute random x/y constrained to the button container‚Äôs bounds and apply absolute positioning within that container; on click, trigger a browser alert with exactly: ‚ÄúHaha! You can't say no! Gotta be mine! üòú‚Äù.

requirements.summary: On Yes click, render the exact success message and show the Happy Propose Day image, then smooth-scroll output into view.
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking Yes shows the message text exactly as provided and renders the image below it.
The image source resolves to a static frontend asset named exactly ‚Äúhappy_propose_day.jpg‚Äù.
After clicking Yes, the page scrolls smoothly so the output area is brought into view.

file_operations.description: Add Yes button behavior: render ‚ÄúYay! You're mine forever! üíñ‚Äù and an image with alt text ‚ÄúHappy Propose Day‚Äù into the output area, then smooth-scroll the output area into view via a ref.
Add the static image asset copy/alias named exactly frontend/public/assets/generated/happy_propose_day.jpg so the UI can reference this exact filename.

requirements.summary: Apply a cohesive warm, playful ‚ÄúPropose Day Surprise‚Äù theme consistently across typography, colors, spacing, and shadows.
acceptanceCriteria: Colors and typography feel consistent and intentionally designed across heading, buttons, and output section.
The primary palette remains warm (yellow/orange/pink/green) and does not shift to a blue/purple-dominant theme.

file_operations.description: Ensure the layout uses consistent spacing and warm-themed UI elements across heading, buttons, and output area (no blue/purple-dominant styling).
Unify global typography and theme styling to maintain a warm, playful palette (yellows/oranges/pinks/greens) and consistent shadows/rounding across the page.

requirements.summary: Add required generated static image asset(s) under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them directly from the UI.
acceptanceCriteria: The image is stored as a static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated.
The UI references the image via its public URL path and it loads successfully in the browser build.

file_operations.description: Add the required generated image asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/happy_propose_day.dim_1200x800.jpg.
Wire the UI to reference the static image from the public assets path (served directly by the frontend) and ensure it loads without any backend fetch.
